location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Muscat to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing an extract (not present) of the accounts of the Bushire Residency, from the date John Macleod took charge to the date Ephraim Gerrish Stannus took over from Captain Henry Hardy; the Resident believes that it should account for a deficiency in the balance of the Residency.
